About Us - Department of Digital Technologies and Governance (DDTG), Himachal Pradesh The Department of Digital Technologies and Governance, established in 2004, aims to promote IT development in Himachal Pradesh. Its key objectives include enhancing IT education, enabling IT investments, and implementing e-Governance for a SMART (Simple, Moral, Accountable, Responsive, Transparent) government. The department oversees projects like e-District Portal, Aadhaar services, and the State Data Centre DIGITAL TECHNOLOGIES & GOVERNANCE DIGITAL TECHNOLOGIES & GOVERNANCE
